Act Now for Discounts & Trade-In Allowances
There’s no better time than now to upgrade your Honeywell Primus II-equipped aircraft to meet the 2020 ADS-B mandate – and qualify for special pricing and trade-in allowances that make the installation more affordable than ever.
Contact Pro Star Aviation today and make arrangements to upgrade your Primus II integrated communication/navigation system before it’s too late. Special pricing and trade in allowances will be in effect for the remainder of 2019.
Depending on the part number of your units, Pro Star Aviation can modify your aircraft to meet the ADS-B mandate starting at $65,000. Pro Star Aviation is able to complete the modification in just seven working days at its Manchester, N.H., facility. They also offer on-the-fly service, providing a convenient, valuable and time-saving alternative for U.S.-based customers.
Don’t be caught short. If you don’t have Automatic Dependent Surveillance-Broadcast capabilities onboard by Jan 1, 2020, you may find yourself unable to fly in controlled airspace in the U.S.
